name: ScratchyBird'
description:
================CONTROLS================

Click = Jump

==================ABOUT==================

ScratchyBird' Is A Scratch Version Of Flappy Bird, Flappy Bird Creators, If You See This, Then Please Don't Sue Me. Anyways... Flappy Bird (plus scratchybird') Is A Game Where You Have To Jump To Avoid Falling, You Should Also Avoid The Pipes.

the whole details are copied from my scratch project, link is here:
